fr.bmartel.protocol.http

Class HttpFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.bmartel.protocol.http.HttpFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHttpFrame

    public class HttpFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHttpFrame
    Http request frame builder and parser

      • decodeFrame

        public HttpStates decodeFrame(java.io.InputStream inputstream)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method used to parse inputstream data extracted from socket in order to retrieve method / uri / host and request body
        Parameters:
        inputstream - socket inputStream
        Returns:
        null if socket connection failed or bad request frame and String terminating by '\r\n' if successfully parsed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • parseHeader

        Parse header putting all headers keys and values found into a map object
        Parameters:
        inputstream - socket inputstream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
